description: Retrieves candlesticks (k-line data history) from 1 day ago to current timestamp (interval: 1 minute) for BTCUSD-PERP
Retrieves candlesticks (k-line data history) from 1 day ago to current timestamp (interval: 30 minutes) for BTCUSD-PERP
Retrieves candlesticks (k-line data history) over a given period (1 hour) for BTCUSD-PERP
